Ndithu Iye ndi Yemwe adayamba kulenga (zolengedwa), ndiponso ndi Yemwe adzazibwereza (pambuyo pa imfa) kuti adzawalipire amene adakhulupirira ndi kumachita zabwino mwa chilungamo.
